mapper.select: SELECT c.uid, c.parent_uid parentUid, c.reply_to_uid replyToUid, c.content, IFNULL(like_count, 0) likeCount, c.create_time createTime, u.uid userId, u.nick_name userNickName, u.pic_uid picUid FROM t_comment c LEFT JOIN t_user u ON c.user_uid = u.uid WHERE c.STATUS = 1 AND c.blog_uid = #{blogId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC limit #{page},10
